Clearing of transactions is manual because it uses ALT for lzReceive.

Example clear tx:

```
pnpm hardhat lz:oapp:solana:clear-with-alt --src-eid 40106 --nonce 24 --sender 0xf941318e00fb58e00701423ba1adc607574bce99 --dst-eid 40168 --receiver 3qsePQwjm5kABtgHoq5ksNj2JbYQ8sczff25Q7gqX74a --guid 0x6e193d2f1811223616d21d1a5364a5f78e315e2b7bb8aae6f8678812331bd152 --payload  --compute-units 99999999999 --lamports 9999999999 --with-priority-fee 9900000000
```
